solution_line_template: Peter is {peter_older} years older than Wayne who is {wayne_age} so Peter is {wayne_age}+{peter_older} = <<{wayne_age}+{peter_older}={peter_age}>>{peter_age} years old
Julia is {julia_older} years older than Peter who is {peter_age} so Julia is {julia_older}+{peter_age} = <<{julia_older}+{peter_age}={julia_age}>>{julia_age} years old
It's {current_year} and Julia is {julia_age} years old so she was born in {current_year}-{julia_age} = <<{current_year}-{julia_age}={julia_birth_year}>>{julia_birth_year}
